main event: A civilian reported observing a single unidentified object in Oakgrove, Oregon on June 29, 1967.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 30 to 40 seconds., The witness was 14 years old and male., The sighting was made from a porch where multiple witnesses were present., The object changed brightness and appeared to stand still at times., The object was described as solid and had an orangish red color.
